meanings.definition: A field where corn is grown.
meanings.sent1: The farmer walked through the vast cornfields at sunset.
meanings.sent2: The cornfields stretched out as far as the eye could see.
meanings.sent3: The scarecrow in the cornfields told jokes to the passing crows.
meanings.sent4: The golden waves of the cornfields danced in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh corn lingered in the air near the cornfields.

meanings.sent1: We drove past endless cornfields on our road trip.
meanings.sent2: The cornfields in the countryside looked picturesque.
meanings.sent3: The children played hide-and-seek among the cornfields.
meanings.sent4: The cornfields whispered secrets to the wind.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the cornfields was breathtaking under the setting sun.
